title: New Monotype Classic Library catalogue available
content:
The new and improved Monotype Classic Library catalogue is now available.   
   
Boasting many new releases, the library is a wonderful typeface resource for the design community. All the fonts in the library are drawn to high standards and crafted to technical specifications second to none.   
   
European designers, to order your free catalogue just email us at [enquire.europe@agfamonotype.com](mailto:enquire.europe@agfamonotype.com) or ring us on +44 (0)1737 765959.
author: seb

comments.content:
Whoever grabs this, would you mind posting   
a small review in this space? Thanks.   
   
Stephen
